channel.title: soldiers on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in soldiers on Game6r

item.title: Anarchy Soldiers 2 game
item.description: Anarchy and chaos reign in the streets of cities. In such a situation, only those who have weapons, perseverance and courage survive. You have to move around the ruined city, destroying everything in your path with the help of a huge machine gun. He is able not only to destroy all living things, but also to cause serious damage to surrounding buildings.

item.title: Game Medieval Soldier Archer
item.description: An excellent simulator for fans of archery. The castle is under siege, and you have to hold the line for 25 days until reinforcements arrive. Shoot from the bow at the approaching enemies, preventing them from approaching the walls of the fortress. After each repulsed attack, you will have the opportunity to improve your skills and improve your weapons.
